name: London Racer: Police Madness
summary: You've applied for a job as a traffic police officer. Your new grumpy boss tells you to go on patrol and write as many fines as possible as the department is low on cash. He promises you a nice bonus so you can buy better equipment if you reach your targets. So, step on it and find and arrest as many offenders as possible. Because more arrests means a bigger bonus on your pay check!
